Summary: driving down highway a glowing green ball apeared and came straight at me.then cut between my truck and car in other lane ,,just before collision
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Seminole
There were no other sightings in Seminole on or around June 10th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailswas coming back from cook out,,driving down highway at 65 mph ,,when all of the sudden a green glowing ball..about the size of a volxwagon..moving at high speed was coming straight at me ,,then it changed directions just before we crashed in to it ,,cutting between my truck and a car in the other lane,,,i hit my breaks hard as did the other car...looking in rear view mirror i could see the other cars break lights,,,but the ball was gone....im like what the heck was that,,,,,if i would have been by my self i wouldnt have believed what i saw,,,but my whole family was with me ,,wife and 3 sons,,,everyone saw it........has anyone else saw anything like what we saw
